name: Jojo-a-GoGo
description:
Welcome to Jojo-a-GoGo!

This game was made as a part of the 2016 NaNoRenO game jam.

You play Jojo, a rabbit that is stage managing her school's winter show.

Some Features Include:

- Three characters to meet

- Seven endings

- 4000+ words

- Teenage awkwardness

- Pixel art

Check the Read Me file for credits.

This if my first attempt at making a visual novel, so I would love to hear feedback.

Thanks for reading! c:
